title: 4 Days Clubs still not Fixed ? O.o
body: Im wanting to get some news on the clubs because i run 2 large active clubs and im unable to play or work with any of my members besides the ones on my friends list... is there any news on maybe when or how much longer its going to take.. players are starting to get Frustrated. Compensation would be nice for this Delay of 4 days ....

replies.body: they will fix it with the new patch i think .
Thank you to you both as soon as anyone hears an update on whats going on with them please let me know so i can explain to my players whats going on please and ty..{{summoner:3}}

Unfortunately, I have no updates on the status of the clubs issue. I'm confident our developers are working hard to resolve this as soon as they can.

While I cannot provide an update or any compensation, let me know if you have any other questions.
